cast.overview: On the rugged isle of Berk, where Vikings and dragons have been bitter enemies for generations, Hiccup stands apart, defying centuries of tradition when he befriends Toothless, a feared Night Fury dragon. Their unlikely bond reveals the true nature of dragons, challenging the very foundations of Viking society.
cast.title: How to Train Your Dragon

cast.overview: Finney Blake, a shy but clever 13-year-old boy, is abducted by a sadistic killer and trapped in a soundproof basement where screaming is of little use. When a disconnected phone on the wall begins to ring, Finney discovers that he can hear the voices of the killer’s previous victims. And they are dead set on making sure that what happened to them doesn’t happen to Finney.
cast.title: The Black Phone

details.biography:
Mason Thames (/θeɪmz/, born July 10, 2007) is an American actor. He played the lead role in the horror film The Black Phone (2021).

Description above from the Wikipedia article Mason Thames, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Mason Thames
